entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tadoule Lake

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 40%
